trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of expressions to apply to a data source control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> class.
Adds a data source expression object to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
The data source expression object to add.
Determines whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object contains a specific data source expression object.
The data source expression object to locate.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance.
Copies elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object to an array, starting at a particular index.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements that are copied.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying starts.
Creates an instance of a data source expression object.
The zero-based index in the array where the data source expression object is located.

The index of the data source expression to create from the ordered list of types returned by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection.GetKnownTypes"></xref> method.
Gets an array of data source expression objects that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object can contain.
An ordered array of data source expression objects that the data source collection can contain.
Gets the index of a specified data source expression object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
The data source expression object to locate.
The index of the data source expression object, if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
Inserts a data source expression object into an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which the object should be inserted.
The data source expression object to insert.
Gets or sets the data source expression object at a specified index.
The zero-based index of the data source expression to get.
The data source expression object at the specified index.
Gets the owner control.
The owner control.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified data source expression object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
The data source expression object to remove.
Removes a data source expression object at a specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpressionCollection"></xref> object.
The zero-based index of the data source expression to remove.
Marks a specified data source expression object as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
The data source expression object to mark as having changed since the last load or save operation from view state.
